Package asap.visualprosody

Automatic, incrementally constructed head motion on the basis of audio features.

    VisualProsodyLoader  

Package asap.visualprosody Description

Automatic, incrementally constructed head motion on the basis of audio features. Works independent of other Asap stuff, so may be used outside Asap.
